All our neural layers.from sentence: All our neural layers , including embeddings , were set to 300 dimensions .

Word embeddings.from sentence: Word embeddings were pretrained ourselves by word2vec on the English Wikipedia corpus and fined tuned during training as apart of model parameters .

applied.from sentence: Initial learning rate was set to 1 , and a power decay was applied .
We applied 2 penalty of 310 ? 4 ; dropout was chosen by validation with a granularity of 0.1 .

stochastic gradient descent.from sentence: We used stochastic gradient descent with a batch size of 50 .
